# data(with:)

**Type Method**

Returns the vCard representation of the specified contacts.

## Declaration

```swift
class func data(with contacts: [CNContact]) throws -> Data
```

## Parameters

- **contacts**: An array of contacts.

## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSData] object with the vCard representation of the contact.

## Discussion
